sections.title: Transportation
sections.description: Getting around Lagos and to the wedding venue

items.name: Airport Transportation
details: Hotel Shuttle: Arrange with recommended hotels
tips: Book airport transfers in advance for better rates
Have Nigerian Naira cash for taxi drivers
Download Uber or Bolt app before arrival

items.name: Wedding Venue Transportation
items.description: Getting to and from the wedding venue
tips: Allow extra time for Lagos traffic
Download Uber or Bolt app before arrival

items.name: Currency
details: Credit cards accepted at hotels and major restaurants
Cash preferred for local transportation and markets

items.name: Safety Tips
details: Do not share travel information with strangers
Keep your phone charged and with you at all times
Share location with trusted family and friends
